author: MetaPoker.finance
content: Hi Everyone,This is the official theme of www.metapoker.financeMetaPoker: MetaPoker: is a gaming platform created for players in the Metaverse.Developed by an ambitious team of poker enthusiasts. MetaPoker is a revolutionary platform that uses blockchain technology to solve key poker industry problems. Even though MetaPoker is still far from our vision of a major poker room, our team is proud that it is the first project of its kind.In the world of MetaPoker, gamers not only play, but can also enjoy and experience the exciting world of the metaverse. Here they can interact with each other, perform, watch and explore the virtual world of metaverseMetaPoker integrates games with the metaverse and blockchain, providing a fully decentralized experience that gives users and creators direct ownership of their in-game items in an ecosystem that is fully transparent and tamper-proof - MetaPoker provides a secure and borderless immersive experience.Using decentralized technology to ensure fair playOne of the key benefits of the blockchain movement is that it empowers users by adding transparency and convenience to traditional services. In particular, poker rooms reserve the right to withhold player funds and disburse them as they see fit, and as a result of complex payment systems, transfers can take days to process.Advantages of betting using cryptocurrencyAll deposits, withdrawals and bets on MetaPoker are made using the cryptocurrency token MPF (chips). Using MPF speeds up payments and allows players to track payments to and from their account on the Binance public network.MPF token holders can quickly transfer funds to and from their MetaPoker account, and for project supporters, it is a means to invest in the platform as it continues to grow and expand. ETH tokens can also be exchanged for MPF in the MetaPoker app, making them as easy to acquire as one of the most popular assets on the cryptocurrency market.MetaPoker's revenue will be used for future promotions, development costs and funding new and ongoing partnerships with leading poker associations to strengthen our brand and provide players with an exciting gaming experience around the world.Community is key to MetaPoker's successIf you are an active player, investor or curious passerby, we invite you to join our community on Telegram (https://t.me/metapokerfinance) or check out our twitter feed (https://twitter.com/metapoker_fi) for the latest news on promotions, app updates and partnerships.Our Community Manager Callan is available to answer questions about MetaPoker and the MPF, he will be glad to help you.We thank you for your participation in our community,MetaPoker.finance.
